query:
UPDATE initiatives SET
  problemStatement = 'Marketing team spends 15-20 hours weekly creating social media content across 8 platforms (Instagram, Facebook, TikTok, LinkedIn, Pinterest, Twitter, YouTube, Threads). Content must be tailored for each platform while maintaining brand voice and seasonal campaign alignment. Current manual process creates bottlenecks and limits posting frequency.',
  aiApproach = 'Deploy GPT-4-based content generation system integrated with brand guidelines, seasonal campaign calendars, and platform-specific best practices. System generates platform-optimized captions, hashtag strategies, and content variations. Includes A/B testing suggestions and engagement prediction scoring.',
  primaryUsers = 'Social Media Manager, Content Marketing Team (4 people), Brand Marketing Director',
  currentWorkflow = '1) Weekly content planning meeting (2 hrs) 2) Manual drafting of posts for each platform (8 hrs) 3) Internal review and edits (3 hrs) 4) Approval process (2 hrs) 5) Manual scheduling across platforms (2 hrs). Total: 17 hours/week',
  proposedWorkflow = '1) Input campaign themes and key messages into AI system (30 min) 2) AI generates platform-specific content variations (automated) 3) Team reviews and selects best options (2 hrs) 4) One-click scheduling across all platforms (30 min). Total: 3 hours/week',
  bottlenecksAddressed = 'Eliminates manual content creation bottleneck, reduces approval cycle time, enables 3x posting frequency, frees team for strategic planning and community engagement',
  quantifiedGoal = 'Reduce social content creation time from 17 hours to 3 hours per week (82% reduction), increase posting frequency from 5 to 15 posts/week, improve engagement rate by 25% through A/B tested content',
  processOwner = 'Social Media Manager',
  affectedTeams = '["Social Media Team", "Content Marketing", "Brand Marketing", "Creative Services"]',
  primaryMetric = 'time_savings',
  baselineMeasurement = 'Current: 17 hours/week content creation, 5 posts/week, 2.3% avg engagement rate',
  successCriteria = '3 hours/week content creation, 15 posts/week, 2.9% engagement rate, 90% team satisfaction with AI-generated content quality',
  measurementMethod = 'Weekly time tracking, platform analytics (engagement, reach, clicks), quarterly team surveys',
  memberExperienceImpact = 'medium',
  brandDifferentiation = 'medium',
  operationalExcellence = 'high',
  impactScale = 'team',
  impactBenefitType = 'Time savings, increased content velocity, improved engagement',
  impactFinancialReturn = 100000,
  feasibilityComplexity = 'low',
  feasibilityTimeline = '4-6 weeks',
  feasibilityDependencies = 'Brand guidelines documentation, API access to social platforms, legal review of AI-generated content policy'
WHERE id = 1;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user oYC4Lz5DqbQiGEf.root --database LVN2BBaghCkJZKnQ9H5R4v --execute UPDATE initiatives SET
  problemStatement = 'Marketing team spends 15-20 hours weekly creating social media content across 8 platforms (Instagram, Facebook, TikTok, LinkedIn, Pinterest, Twitter, YouTube, Threads).   processOwner = 'Social Media Manager',
